website_summaries.verdict: Rest easy knowing you can set and regulate your mat's temperature with the conveniently included thermostat.
pros: Clear instructions make set up quick and simple
Included thermostat allows you to set and regulate the temperature
Thermostat shows temperature in both Celsius and Fahrenheit
Plants typically sprout in about a week
Mat effectively keeps soil at a consistent temperature
cons: LED lights in thermostat don't last very long, but thermostat is still readable without lights

customer_reviews.title: Temperature control doesn’t work for very long
customer_reviews.text: This mat worked great for about 3 weeks after I started using it. Then went downhill quick. I purchased this mat for the temperature control aspect on the thermostat since I’ve had issues with regular heat mats getting too warm for my seeds that need to be at 80-85 degrees. The same problem has now occurred with this mat where the mat will heat up and show from 95 up to 118 on the thermostat for the temp even when I set the heat to the lowest setting of 68. Not worth the money if it’s only going to work for less than a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi Williams

customer_reviews.title: Crapped out after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: the temperature control turned off while plugged in and has yet to turn back on, just decided to stop working randomly, so now my clones are dying. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Kristian

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 5 months
customer_reviews.text: It is obvious why the mat has a one year warrantee and the thermostat only 30 days. The control displayed an error message after 4 months and then totally failed. There was no basis for this other than the product quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The digital thermostat stopped working after only two days, ...
customer_reviews.text: The digital thermostat stopped working after only two days, total made in China cheap junk. I just use the heating pad now and really don't need the thermostat. Save your money and don't buy the thermostat!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Epo

customer_reviews.title: Unusable thermostat
customer_reviews.text: The mat seems nice but half the lights on the thermostat were dead rendering it unusable. I'm very disappointed since I was hoping to start my seeds today.
customer_reviews.author: Anina M.

customer_reviews.title: controller is crap
customer_reviews.text: I was given this as a Christmas gift. Checked to see that it worked...and it did...put it away for spring planting. Checked it again. Set would not go out of Centigrade. figured I would work with that...but today when I set the whole thing up ready to start, The controller doesn't not work at all. needless to say I am extremely unhappy and so are my 42 tomatoes. My husband is also unhappy as he is the one that got me the much wanted seed mat for Christmas. not at all a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: BLUE

customer_reviews.title: Seedlings are doing great.
customer_reviews.text: Using this mat and a Jiffy tray, tomatoes germinated in 3-5 days, eggplant began to germinate in 5-7 days, and peppers in 7 days. I soaked the seeds in warm water for about 6 hours (not overnight) before planting, and set the thermostat to 85 degrees. I placed the thermostat probe in one of the peat pods, so it would measure the soil temperature. When the trays were covered with a dome, the temperature was 80-85 degrees, which is 15-20 degrees warmer than room temperature. After removing the dome and setting them under 2 shop lights, the temperature is around 74-79 degrees. Seedlings are doing great.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Updated Review: I did not request an exchange for the mat. I opted for a heat lamp instead. The company Visosun, was very responsive and apologized for the mat not working. They sent a prompt refund. I cannot change my review of the mat since I did not opt for a replacement. As for the company, I think their customer service is very good. So if you do run into problems, they will work quickly to fix it. Original Review: The mat only heated once. I was not able to set the temp since the display would not fully light up. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MickHRDk9

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Received it, turned it on, and set it to 79 degrees for the past 2 or so days. the thermostat reads 78-79 degrees but the mat feels the same as when i unpacked it. i placed a separate and independent thermometer right next to the thermostat's sensor and it reads 70, which is the same temperature i had before this mat.
customer_reviews.author: brooks

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I received this item yesterday. The setup was incredibly easy. I set the thermostat to 82 degrees Fahrenheit . I inserted the probe the into the center cell, and it heated up to 82 degrees surprisingly quickly. This morning, I checked my seedlings and the thermostat read 72 degrees. I moved the probe, unplugged and plugged in the cord again, confirmed that it was still set for 82 degrees, and nothing. I pulled out the thermostat and confirmed that it was adjusting to hot and cold temperature. I left is alone to see if something would happen, and several hours later, still no heat. It didn't even last a day. Incredibly disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: P. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this heat mat for 2 months now and I am happy with it. I work for a large hemp company and use these at the house for germinating seeds and very soon rooting clones. This mat works very well for both uses. I'm at 8500ft in colorado so during fall winter and spring it gets chilly in the house. These mats have a hard time keeping up the temp at 78 degrees while its 60 in the house but it works and I have successfully rooted many clones and seeds with it. I reccomend definitely, easy to set up, hasn't failed yet. Vivosun makes good products at good prices.
customer_reviews.author: alec libby

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't heat
customer_reviews.text: Mine didn't heat, though the digital readout was all over the place. The outlet for the plug leading to the digital readout was a three-pronged safety outlet, but the plug itself was a two-pronged plug. The whole unit has a cheap look and feel, and it is not UL tested, though it does look like some foreign lab I have never heard of certified the thing. I don't trust it and am afraid it will burn the house down if I leave it alone. I sent it back right away, and would not recommend it to anyone. A cheap, defective, potentially dangerous piece of junk, made in China.
customer_reviews.author: spork

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for starting seedlings
customer_reviews.text: I used this to start seedlings in my closet in April in the PNW. My seeds, for the most part, sprouted super fast and grew a lot taller than planting then straight outside (probably too cold still outside). Peas and bush beans sprouted in a week. I used this with a grow light, but the grow light wasn't enough and I ended up pushing the little seedlings outside quickeier than I had wanted (lest they become leggy). It was easy to stick the thermometer in the soil and set the temperature. Sometimes it wouldn't make it up to the 71 degrees I set it, and would hover around 68 or so, but much better than the soil outside at 49F.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Martin

customer_reviews.title: temperature fluctuates -2/+8 F around set temperature
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect, so I put a temperature logger in the container with my seedlings (see picture). To my surprise, the temperature fluctuates around 10 degrees, with the set temperature towards the bottom of the range. If you're sprouting seeds, be sure to set it for low 70s, because if you set it to 80, it'll go almost to 90 during the heating cycle.
customer_reviews.author: W. Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Mat gets too hot when temp. controller is not used, Temp controller is not calibrated according to digital readout. It reads 4-10 degrees too warm according to two other digital thermometers used to test the actual temperature of the mat. I bought two of these and both do the same. You get what you pay for.... I am using them but I sure am happy I tested temperatures compared to the readout on the controller. I just have to set it at 80 degrees to achieve a somewhat inconsistent temp of 72. Advice: Do not trust the controller readout. Check it with another thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: D.L.  Hither Creek Organics.

customer_reviews.title: Very Reliable
customer_reviews.text: After the initial brewing of kombucha in one-gallon jars, I bottle it in 16 oz. bottles for an additional four-day ferment. I use the heating mat & thermostat to keep the bottles (which I place in a styrofoam cooler-type box) at a constant temperature during that period. This works so well that, once set, I never have to adjust anything until time to remove the bottles from the box. In fact, it works so well that I am thinking of buying another mat & thermostat to use for the gallon jars, as this works so much better than the belt-type heater I have for them. I highly recommend this mat & thermostat; it's very reliable!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: It was good while it lasted... All 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 3 months and used it for maybe 4 weeks of that total. The rest of the time it was unplugged and stored away. Went to use it tonight and it won't stay turned on. It'll flicker on for a second, then instantly die again. Moving the wires gets some life from it, but something is broken. A shame.
customer_reviews.author: Sephris

customer_reviews.title: Does not maintain consistent temperature.
customer_reviews.text: The mat completely fails at keeping the set temperature. I had no problems setting the temp & hooking up the mat, but the highly variable temps are not ideal for my pepper seedlings, which I need to keep warm for germination. What is the point of having a heat mat if it doesn't keep warm???
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: these work amazing with the exception... That one of the controllers failed. Luckily the warranty paid off they sent me a replacement. I have 3 of these kits and they are an amazing value that ive only seen beaten by one other brand. The quality to price is the best i have found. Using this does require you to get the temperature probe right. I suggest getting an IR temp gun so you can make sure you arent cooking whatever you are using the mat on with bad probe placement. Other then that is not much you have to do besides set it and do whatever you were expecting to grow.
customer_reviews.author: TRLR12

customer_reviews.title: The one I ordered a year ago worked good, so I bought another in mid October 2017
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered two of these. The one I ordered a year ago worked good, so I bought another in mid October 2017. That one went bad this week, four months later. The display reads, "Err" & no relay click, no heat. I can still change temp scales & set the on/off temp but as soon as I click the "set" button..."Err". Kinda disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: F.Oswald

customer_reviews.title: Great thermostat, malodorous heating pad
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and set up the combo about 6 weeks ago. The thermostat comes with clear instructions and works very well. The mat heated up quickly but, fully heated, had a vile smell. Fortunately I have other mats, so I substituted one for the Vivosun mat. I have not been able to bring myself to use the Vivosun mat again. The odor smelled toxic. Nevertheless, I've been very pleased with the thermostat. I've learned that without a thermostat my mats were not heating up to the desired 80 degree temperature for starting pepper, eggplant, tomato and squash seeds. With the thermostat I've halved my germination time.
customer_reviews.author: law prof

customer_reviews.title: Temperature not moving up - stuck - for the 3rd time
customer_reviews.text: My thermostat meter gets stuck 3rd time after 1month and 3 weeks since I bought. It was working just fine but started to get stuck not going further up from 76F. I live in Florida and it’s just slightly over my home temperature. I set it up to 100F to get it moving up but nothing. I turn it off 5 min by pulling it from the electricity. It worked twice but I really don’t want to have to check every time if it’s working and I should not have to do that procedure! Any ideas? Can’t return after Feb 8th . Not happy right now since I have rare tropical palm seeds germinating.
customer_reviews.author: Janaiy

customer_reviews.title: Great product & Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this heating pad with temperature regulator to place inside a my indoor grow tent. I have been growing super hot peppers and the previous heating pad I had purchased did not seem to bring the soil temperature up as high as it needed to be. Within a few hours the temperature is where I need it to be and only fluctuates +/- 0.3 degrees F. The only thing I would like to see is a way to plug in two heating pads to the regulator.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Newman

customer_reviews.title: Solid performer, works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: No real complaints. It does exactly what i needed / purchased it for My only gripe is with the CONTROLLER, (not the mat it cant cool :) Would have liked to see a cooling mode included with the controller too for fans etc instead . but its probably a better business decision for ViVo selling 2 separate items, soo guess we have to buy that in a separate unit. Im not salty Vivosun we all got bills...lol You guys sell alot of really great economical stuff for beginners, all in one spot. So, Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Frosty

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product at first, but customer service is on top of it.
customer_reviews.text: I had same issue as others as far as the controller having a burnt out LCD bar so instead of a 8 it would look like 0, and a 3 would look like ] and so forth and so on. It was also not accurate and out of calibration by about 5 degrees verified by 2 calibrated mettler toledo devices I use for other things. However, I contacted customer service and they were so nice and prompt in sending me a fully functional and accurate replacement its hard to dock them any stars from a defective first one. They are a great company.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Mat is fantastic, Controller is defective
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't care if the controller was cheaply made junk if they would return my phone call or email and fix the issue - however this is not what's happened. My controller's temp readout (I'm assuming from a faulty probe) fluctuates rapidly and constantly over about a 2-3 deg F range. This makes it constantly click on and off when it gets close to the setpoint. Still works, but it's annoying to listen to and for sure it's not safe to hammer an electrical switch on and off like that every few seconds, indefinitely. Guess I'll just buy a new controller from a different company?
customer_reviews.author: theCTgrower

customer_reviews.title: Thermometer seems fine, actual heat isn't great.
customer_reviews.text: Directions say it takes about 5 hours to reach expected temperature, and you have to insulate it. The heat output seems very low for 20W, and it seems to raise temperatures by about 5-10 degrees after leaving it for several hours. Not recommended if you have a cold room, and need to heat something by more than 5-10 I wouldn't call this a heat mat, more like a "warming" mat.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Weber

customer_reviews.title: This product lasted for less than four months
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed. I feel I have used this product according to its requirements, but I did not even last four months. It no longer heats, and it no longer shows the temperature. I have tried unplugging and the standard techniques one would use on an electronic controlled device, but I only have a power led lit and nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: Chad K. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Wasted $50 worth of seeds!
customer_reviews.text: Follow up review March 22,2020. After the first use that rot all of my seedling. I tried to use it again and I noticed that there is no heat from the mat at all. No wonder why my first set of expensive adenium arabicum seeds get roted. First review: It is easy to use. However, it did not provide the correct heat causing the seeds I am propagating to rot! I set the temperature to 87deg F using the temperature control that I bought with it. But the heat mat only provides 65 deg F causing my seeds to rot!
customer_reviews.author: Sonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Dependable
customer_reviews.text: The heat mat just being able to roll up is an awesome thing. My Hydrofarm took up so much space and this Heat Mat /Thermostat rolls right up and fits in a pull string bag that comes with the item. I really like that the mat is slick for easy cleaning and very flexible. The temperature is consistent throughout the Heat Mat and stays at the temperature you set it to. The Thermostat is very easy to use and electrical and temperature prob have long enough cords you won't feel constricted by short cords. All in all I am very satisfied with another VIVOSUN product.
customer_reviews.author: T.E.G

customer_reviews.title: Working great
customer_reviews.text: It came rolled up and was able to get it to lay flat by simply unrolling it out. Pretty much keeps the temp I set it at too. In a small sandwich Tupperware container with seeds just laying on top of potting soil with a damp paper towel on top, seedlings came up in three days. I sealed the container so the towel stayed moist the whole time. The secret is to give the paper towel, after you wet it, a good squeeze so it is moist not wet.
customer_reviews.author: Wacky

customer_reviews.title: Does not maintain temperature
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if it’s an issue with the mat or with the thermostat but the temperature is set to 78 degrees and everyday since receiving the product, the temperature reads lower everyday. Currently reading 71 degrees instead of the 78 it’s set to. If I set the temperature higher, the thermostat reads the same or sometimes the temperature drops. I will be returning this item, hopefully my seeds aren’t affected.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk Top Warmer - Seedling Heat Mat and Digital Thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Great Desk Warmer - Seedling Heat Mat and Digital Thermostat. Yep, you read it right. I'm using this to warm the top of my cold metal computer desk. Instead of having freezing arms and hands while at my cold computer desk I now have warm arms and hands. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: earthfriendly

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate thermostat
customer_reviews.text: I can't seem to figure out how to contact the seller about this. Looks great, just what I wanted. But the thermostat doesn't work right. I have it set for 74 degrees. The thermostat starts heating when the temp shows barely below 76 degrees so most of the time my seed bed is between 77 and 79 degrees. I am going to try dropping the temperature another degree or two----but it just seems like with a brand new product I shouldn't have to worry about that sort of adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Constance J. Bagot

customer_reviews.title: Bloom time
customer_reviews.text: Testing out the temp control on the pad and had tried three different temperature readings from three different probes. The difference was plus or minus about 5 degrees or so but it depends on how deep the probes are. Like one is at the very bottom of the seed cup of course thats gonna read higher than the top side. Overall it great to have a durable matt for seeds to bloom.. Will buy again for sure for more planta next year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for seedlings and mycelium
customer_reviews.text: Temperature sensor has a suction cup and works correctly...keep it on the underside of Tupperware lid for seedlings in rockwool at 85....bottom of Tupperware at 89 for mycelium . mat is durable, controller easy to use just hold down set button till blinks. bought alotta vivosun products and they all work great.
customer_reviews.author: walter kuebler

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for my micro green set up
customer_reviews.text: Needed to add some heat to my micro green growing set up, i keep my house well below the optimum temperature for good growth. That ability to add heat has increased my output. The set up and adjustment of the temperature is a bit confusing based up on really poor instructions, once you accomplish the set up for the first time you will have no issues in making future adjustments and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Glen E ThomasTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Good to keep just about anything warmer in the winter months....
customer_reviews.text: Had planned to use this in early spring to help tomatoes/peppers start strong. Thought that I might use it a bit early in my vericomposter to keep my wigglers toasty as winter approaches. It’s not quite time to keep them inside full time, nor do they like the 30-40 degree temps at night. Just put this on them at night and it keeps the temp in top tray at 75 degrees. Very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Nsjonesjr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, but the initial setup is confusing
customer_reviews.text: The mat and thermostat controller are excellent products, but the information sheet used for the initial setup is incomplete and confusing... Obviously written by someone who knows the product too well and thus leaves out some needed information. It didn't take too long to figure it out, although I did get a bit frustrated as I started setting it up. Once setup, you may never have to do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Not Vivosun's Best
customer_reviews.text: Designed in California, made in The People's Republic of China with some caution, usually isn't a bad thing (thank you Apple). I have purchased and used extensively other quailty Vivosun products but this unfortunately is not one of them. The thermometer attachment is a joke, just buy the heating mat alone. It's malfunction or poor quality testing made me lose a whole round of seedlings. The mat by itself is good though.
customer_reviews.author: John Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it for indoor seed starting
customer_reviews.text: These are working great! 142 of my 144 seedlings germinated (which I realize is about high quality seeds as much as anything) and my seedlings are looking great at about 5 weeks of growth. Setup was simple and the temp is nice and constant. I do rotate my little packs around periodically because the center of the strip is warmer than the edges, but that's easy to do and not surprising.
customer_reviews.author: Jess D.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE!
customer_reviews.text: The thermostat on this resets constantly and the mat is SO INADEQUATE!! The seller didn't even respond when given this information. I don't know if the set is just bad, or if they're all bad, but they will never have my money again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some Issues for My use
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to heat Mason jars used as betta fish containers. However,you can't get the temperature probe in water. It has been suggested I place a small container of moist potting soil in the center of the matt and the Mason jars in a circle around the container holding the fish. We will see how that will work. I'll post again if I have positive results with the suggestion.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: It works, but it's a pain to use
customer_reviews.text: Adjusting the temperature is a pain in the rear, and I wish it was able to show the degrees in different formats - mine only does Celsius. It does warm things well, I used it to help keep melted chocolate from hardening during use, and will soon be using it to keep baby seedlings warm. It's easy to wipe down with a damp cloth, and stores easily as well.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: I received this product a week ago and immediately giving it a try. I put the fresh pumpkin seeds in a piece of wet paper towels, and the dried seeds in the other. Put them not in the plastic bags. Set the temp at 82 degrees. The fresh seeds are sprouting in three days, the dried seeds in sprouting in 7 days. Just wow.
customer_reviews.author: Dtran

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I used this mat for my seed starts this year. I had hoped to control the temperature to get a better germination rate and so I ordered the mat that included the thermometer. According to the thermometer, the mat never got above 72 degrees (and was often more like 69-70 degrees) even after setting it much higher. It said it was heating the entire 2 weeks I had it in use. Overall, I am very disappointed in this product. It would have been very easy to use had it come up to temperature as it should have.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Arrington

customer_reviews.title: Working well
customer_reviews.text: In-service for approximately 1 month, under 2 gallons of kombucha. Temperature of brew is very consistent, and controller indicates that element is powered only as needed. unit is performing exactly as i had hoped. required about 3 days to interpret controller display : kombucha temperature relationship. in my environment, a controller setting of 78.0 ambient is maintaining a brew temp of approx. 80-82.
customer_reviews.author: joel of capo beach

customer_reviews.title: Great Heat Mat for great price
customer_reviews.text: I honestly, have never used a heat mat before in starting my plants from seed. This year is a different story! I honestly did not think this was working until i set it to go up above what it was and it started condensation on the inside of the humidity dome. Then I used the instant read temp and it was the same! Very pleased with this product and would recommend it. It is easy to use right out of the box and comes with instructions as well as a carrying bag for easy storage after you are done with it.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Jo Derby

customer_reviews.title: Seems to do as it says
customer_reviews.text: The temperature appears to stay at a fairly constant temperature according to the probe. The mat and control seem to be working as they should. But, I waited too long to get the mat and I don't think my hydrangea cuttings will make it. Not the fault of the equipment, more operator error. I am anxious to use the mat int he spring when I have seeds to germinate.
customer_reviews.author: GrammaBof5

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this in a cabinet where medicines and supplements are kept to maintain a fairly constant temperature despite daily swings of as much as 15 degrees in the rest of the room. I am tickled pink at being able to provide that stead temperature finally in a cost effective way.
customer_reviews.author: First Tiger Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Faulty temperature reading
customer_reviews.text: The temperature is wrong. The plants that I put so much time and energy are dying because I trusted this product. I bought it because this brand is supposed to be reputable. If you decide to buy this, please check the temperature several times during the day/week before trusting it.
customer_reviews.author: Landy

customer_reviews.title: Great heating mat with essential thermostat
customer_reviews.text: I read the manual before settling this up inside a large storage case. I’m using this to root cuttings, and the consistent heat/warmth is the key in success. So far, this has been super effective in rooting my cuttings. It seems accurate in keeping the temperature around the set temperature. I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Works well for Hermit Crab tank!
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the under tank pad you buy at a pet store! It covers the entire back of the tank and I can set a temp. Incredible customer service! My first one malfunctioned and wouldn't go above 70. They sent a replacement the moment I sent an email, I had it in 2 days. Awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty mat.
customer_reviews.text: Mat worked for five days then went cold. Thermostat seems fine. Hope to get replacement on mat to try again. UPDATE: Vivosun replaced the mat no questions asked. Great customer service and my seeds are warm again. Thank You Vivosun. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alber Excavating Inc.

customer_reviews.title: I like this seed mat
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement, old mat gave out after many years. I really like the digital temp control. I put it through a test run and am pleased with it, maintains the temp as described. It popped all old garden test seeds in 2-3 days. Will be very handy, love the temp control, old was was a dial controller and not so accurate.
customer_reviews.author: catzilla

customer_reviews.title: Take note...
customer_reviews.text: The heat pad says itself it only keeps it 10 to 20 degrees warmer then the air around it. My reason for getting it was to keep the temperature from getting too cold for my new seedlings. Since my temperature didn't drop below 39, the heat pad kept them at 43 degrees. So yay plants didn't freeze off, but boo I was hoping for warmer. Hope this helps with your decision, if I had known I'd have kept looking... Good luck
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: A Heating Mat Tride & True
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this heating mat to sprout seeds in a dome under a T5 light. So far it has exceeded my expectations! The best part of this purchase is the thermostat. The mat plugs into the thermostat and the thermostat plugs into a 120v outlet. Its accurate, easy to use, and reliable. As an added bonus the probe also gives an accurate reading of either the dome, or the starting soil. This is the second Vivosun purchase I've made and they continue to impress. I will be looking for new ways to add their product into my grow rooms. **This is not a paid purchase. I independently purchased this item and reviewed it**
customer_reviews.author: David James

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold the temperature
customer_reviews.text: This mat didn't keep the temp even close to a steady 72 that I set it for, at times dropping to 67. It also did not make a difference in the time it took my seeds to germinate vs just on a plain mat. For the price I paid, I am very disappointed and have decided to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jolly

customer_reviews.title: Product Worked Well for A While
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for plant propagation and just now got to use it. The controller worked well for about a week and then the screen went blank and is unresponsive. I have two others that are working well, but this one was a dud. I would recommend this only if you are not concerned about the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Put this under a covered 10 20 tray with pepper seeds. Placed the probe thru a hole inside the tray cover. Had a fantastic germination rate.
customer_reviews.author: gfang

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t get warm enough
customer_reviews.text: Received unit in good shape. Was excited about this product because we have had good luck with the Vivosun product line so far. Easy to use and set up, but doesn’t seem to get very warm. Unit has been running for three days, hasn’t gotten above 69 degrees. Using indoors and the ambient temperature is 72 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur P Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Beginner gardener
customer_reviews.text: I just started gardening this year and this heat mat with the thermostat ensured that all my seeds sprouted in half the time listed on the seed packages. Every single seed sprouted thanks to this device. I am very happy with this purchase and recommended your product to others as well.
customer_reviews.author: Supernova

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first week
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. Followed instructions and use suggestions. . . After the first 3 days, one of the temp controls (made of cheap feeling plastic) went out. Then just 2-3 days later, both heat mats stopped working completely. . . Definitely disappointed that I spent almost $60 on what turned out to be trash.
customer_reviews.author: BadWolf1224

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for winter gardens and an excellent price!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for maintaining a consistent temperature but works better in a warmer environment I tried it in the garage and it was too cold as soon as I moved inside to a warmer environment it has been perfect I like how I don't have to monitor the temperature because the thermostat is spot on within a few degrees... Very happy with my purchase and would buy it again!!... It's almost $20.00 less than eBay too!!
customer_reviews.author: Marshall R.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't control temperature
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year for seed starting. It has never been able to control temperature. Though the thermostat shows NO heating once the set temperature is reached,, the pad still continues to heat turning myself into a thermostat by plugging and unplugging
customer_reviews.author: B. George

customer_reviews.title: It does the job for my ferments
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty well. Changing the temp takes probably 6 secs of pressing down, not 3. Was a little confusing until I looked back at the page and then it seemed easier. I needed it for my ferments since we keep a cold house and it seems to be working. Will try on seeds in a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Nihx Knows

customer_reviews.title: Great for proofing bread!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to build my own proofing box. I use an insulated cooler, and this mat is perfect. Keeps my bread at exactly the temperature I need for proofing, and is very stable and accurate with temperatures. Highly recommend if you are a baker, and like DIY projects!
customer_reviews.author: Dreamer23

customer_reviews.title: Great heat source
customer_reviews.text: Works good for reptile enclosures. If using under a tank, add a piece of carpet or rubber mat between the heating pad and whatever the enclosure rests on. The pad heats almost equally on both sides. Keep the temperature sensor close to the heating pad for accuracy on the controller - turning on and off.
customer_reviews.author: C. SATISH SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Warming pad
customer_reviews.text: I use it with an oversized clear plastic tub to help bread rise. Works great.Lot less than $150.00 for proofing box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Heating Pad
customer_reviews.text: I use this to warm the water in some DWC containers. It's doing a great job of keeping the temperature stable in the containers that are on top of it. It's heating around 6 gallons of water in plastic containers. I never read the instructions but it was easy to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Diacis

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Another great product by vivosun! Display is great and buttons function with ease. I plugged everything in and it cycled as it should. I love it. My seedlings will be loving their new heated bed I'm sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and Keeps Plants Warm
customer_reviews.text: This has been keeping my seedlings nice and warm through out the colder times. They've been at a steady 75 degrees since I bought the product. I tested the temperature accuracy with my own thermometer and it was within a few tenths of a degree. I would definitely recommend this for anybody starting seeds indoors through the winter. The only downside is that the cord could be longer.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda L.

customer_reviews.title: Works As Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Heating blanket works. Thermostat works. Controls are pretty simple. It made my eggplant and pepper seeds germinate. I may even try it in the kitchen for rising bread dough, once its work in the potting shed is done for the spring.
customer_reviews.author: ExRxIT

customer_reviews.title: Too Hot
customer_reviews.text: The thermostat was not accurate and it fried my clones. Used a regular thermometer and the soil was 10 degrees warmer than the prob temperature was set at!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence H. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: It's kind of amazing
customer_reviews.text: My houseplants were getting pretty cold esp this winter and were not doing well. The local garden store recommended a heating pad and since then my houseplants have been thriving! I bought a second pad because my plants have been doing so well.
customer_reviews.author: jubilee80

customer_reviews.title: FAKE ITEM AND COMPANY
customer_reviews.text: This item doesn’t exist. They don’t actually have the mat. Then once you buy the combo set, they charge you to return the item. What a great, fake company to buy from. I will definitely be investing more of my money into this “legitimate” business.
customer_reviews.author: CJ_Jim

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I am using this in the basement. It is cold down there so I have yet to see the temperature control feature be needed. The mat does raise the temp of the pots I using by a few degrees. The heating is even throughout. The only downside I have noticed it that sometimes the heating mat bubbles up a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one season
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this April 23 2019 and it[control unit] worked one season. Got it out today April 9 and it reads 87 degrees and I can't get it below 80.4. So a little disappointed with 3 mats to set up. Wish there was something better quality..
customer_reviews.author: Dalsn1

customer_reviews.title: VIVOSUN 10"x20.75" Seedling Heat Mat and Digital Thermostat Combo Set Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I have had, and used, other heating mats, but this one is really great! Using it right now and it does WORK! Simple to operate. Main thing here is that it WORKS! You can order with confidence here, I know, I bought and are using it!
customer_reviews.author: nicemachines

customer_reviews.title: Seeds germinate. Good enough for me!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't do any fancy tests to see how evenly the temperature is distributed, but the mat made my seeds germinate, and that's all I care about. Easy to set up and the mat is flexible. It comes with a nice little bag for storage.
customer_reviews.author: shell1026

customer_reviews.title: Best value for price
customer_reviews.text: Used this to help germinate my tomato and pepper 10x20 flats. At first I had the cell trays on top of a thick plastic flat and then on top of the mat. This was too much material however to do a good job. After removing the flat and putting the cell tray directly on top of the mat it worked like a charm, especially after adding a humidity dome. Was able to maintain soil temperature of 85, even with ambient temperatures in the 50s.
customer_reviews.author: KATIE

customer_reviews.title: Great product + great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I'm using a mat with a thermostat. Both work great for my purposes. The thermostat turns off power to the mat when the set temperature is reached and turns it back on when temperature (as measured by an accompanying prob) falls 0.5*F below the set temperature, so the resulting temp is quite steady. My original mat produced wonky results, so I reached out to Vivosun for an advice. After a few prompt responses I've got a replacement in like 2 days and it works great now. That's how I know the customer service is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Ingvar M.

customer_reviews.title: Works well -just insulate under the mat
customer_reviews.text: Works well, just put a towel or rug under the mat and it will stay insulated. It does seem to struggle with maintaining the setting I put it on when in a very cold room, I understand though. This mat works very well though, defiantly helped with my seedlings!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis C King

customer_reviews.title: Successfully starting seeds
customer_reviews.text: It is working wonderfully. I currently have seeds sprouting in seed trays which are sitting on the heat mat. It has helped to sprout seeds quicker. I like that it monitors the temperature. I find myself looking at the temperature reading several times a day just out of curiosity. I am needing to buying another heat mat to sprout more seeds quicker. I will definitely be purchasing a second heat mat.
customer_reviews.author: cottontail

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 3 weeks. Then cooked my jalepenos.
customer_reviews.text: Believe the bad reviews. Temp controller is trash. Only works for a few weeks. Then goes crazy. Rechecked and repositioned the probe. Still red way too low and just pumped out heat. Tossed in trash. Don’t waste your money I had to start over twice
customer_reviews.author: 300BLK

customer_reviews.title: Getting good results
customer_reviews.text: I have had the mat for several months now and I really like it. I haven't had any of the problems people are complaining about in other reviews. I've had better germination results and it seems to be accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions don't really tell you everything but its pretty easy to figure out. Works great for germinating peppers, especially the superhots!
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: It quit on second use
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the concept, but it quit working on the second use. It can't reach it's claimed temps. Without additional light or other heat source. It can't heat my terrarium more than 7 degrees and that's a high. This a true Fail and I've been left in the cold by Vivosun. BOO HISS TO YOU VIVOSUN
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: These mats worked for me.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 heating mats, Coast of Maine seeding soil and grow lights. I had 99.9% germination. I consider it a success because I’ve never done this before. I hope to have a garden forest in my back yard this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dubia roach colonies
customer_reviews.text: Love this seedling heat mat! I started breeding roaches for my lizards and this works awesome and it’s nice because I ran the thermostat inside the container I breed them in so I am getting a very accurate temperature. I may get another mat for a second bin since they’re breeding so fast
customer_reviews.author: Jk

customer_reviews.title: Nice for starting seeds early
customer_reviews.text: Neat to heat seeds in a starting tray, especially in my basement in the winter. The thermostat is easy to use and could be used with alternate heat sources up to 1000W. I run the mat and a 60W incandescent bulb in a small enclosed space to easily maintain 75F although the air around is only 60-62F, giving the seeds an early start.
customer_reviews.author: wild bill

customer_reviews.title: First Mat - Dead,  Second Mat -Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Took it out of the box and it didn't work. The thermostat seems to work okay, but the actual mat didn't work at all. Vivosun did get back to me to send a new mat and it works great! Love the customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Lord Woodward

customer_reviews.title: First class
customer_reviews.text: Man Vivosun, this thing is nice. Easy to use, very accurate. Germination rates in the winter are up to 95% now. I was going to try another company but there is no need. This thing is great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: But ultimately extremely disappointed in the thermometer
customer_reviews.text: As mentioned by other reviewers, the thermometer leaves much to be desired. First use and it already has parts of the numbers that don't work. Debating returning for my money back (in lieu of replacement) since I know I'm not the only review with this feedback. Am using for a day or two to see if it works generally before making my decision. But ultimately extremely disappointed in the thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name1

customer_reviews.title: not the same
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the weatherproof heating pad model but i saw and bought a package deal because it came with temp control. that package did NOT come with the water/weatherproof!! heating pad :( I feel misled , read item description carefully so you don't accidentally end up with the subpar model
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Plugged in set the temp for my plants and has been working fine. The temp goes up like .5-1 degree than set temp cools the heat until a littler lower then kicks back on. Looking to buy another shortly to expand my garden come spring!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Wares

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable or accurate
customer_reviews.text: Seedling mat is ok - quickly warms up. Thought to buy the digital thermostat to prevent it from killing my seedlings. Turns out I can have the thermostat state 89 degrees and the pad registers only at 78 so there definitely is a failure here. Have tried two different heating mats and both register the same.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little bit of a sloppy setup but it seems to work (as in its heats up). I did set a temperature and it’s showing it’s exceeding that temperature, then it shows the temperature of dropping by 6-7 degrees. So not so sure about this. Also it came with little to no instructions at all.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Bennington

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect to get it to warm up past 70 degrees Fahrenheit
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay heating pad but I need to get my seedlings at 85 degrees Fahrenheit and it can't seem to get to that temp despite also building a small green house and having it in a sunny place by the window.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Monk

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: I am updating this review because it turns out I caused the thermostat controller to fail! It is only rated for appliances up to 1K and I unwittingly tried to use it to control a 1.5K space heater. When used correctly this package works great and I have had 100% germination rate using this little setup over the past year.
customer_reviews.author: Ragnarson

product_meta.title: VIVOSUN 10"x20.75" Seedling Heat Mat and Digital Thermostat Combo Set MET Standard
feature_bullets: RELIABLE RESULTS: VIVOSUN’s professional heat mat maintains temperatures in the sweet spot of around 20-30℃（68-86℉）- perfect for seed starting and cutting propagation
STABLE, UNIFORM HEAT: VIVOSUN's strengthened heating film ensure this durable mat never scorches your roots and produces lots of revitalizing dew when used with a humidity dome

PROFESSIONAL RELIABILITY: The controller maintains a stable temperature between 40-108°F (5-42°C) for professional horticultural systems; the sensor probe delivers accurate readings in both cool and warm environments

ZERO-EFFORT SETUP AND OPERATION: The controller comes with a manual, but you won’t need to read it! Using 3 buttons, you can set a temperature or change the display between Fahrenheit/Celsius in seconds

SAFETY GUARANTEED: This 10" x 20.75" mat is perfect for standard 1020 trays and slightly larger than comparable mats on the market; VIVOSUN heat mat Combo Set is the best choice for safe and professional heat-mat regulation

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,893 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
